subject: Baseball
World Series
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After watching a replay of Chase Utley’s hard slide at second base that broke Tejada’s leg during Game 2 of the teams’ division series against the Dodgers, Tejada concluded it was a dirty play.
snippet: After watching a replay of Chase Utley’s hard slide at second base that broke Tejada’s leg during Game 2 of the teams’ division series against the Dodgers, Tejada concluded it was a dirty play.
